column4: and gksudo doesn't do sudo properly for me. if i run sudo i expect everything to be done as root. gksudo changes that, so it's kinda useless for me.
rever to your old file. the edits you made are incorrect
yes, go back to the old file. so assuming you did the full command i asked you to: sudo cp /etc/fstab.bak /etc/fstab
once you've done that paste the file and i'll paste the corrected version

did you do the sudo cp /etc/fstab /etc/fstab.bak ?
ah, so that is the orig? Ok, good. hang on one second
